nodes.bodyText: Please check #25082 (comment)
Shall we replace the streams since we're updating this bit?
changed.
Can we call analyze instead of directly calling accept?
changed.
What do we mean by last pattern and what does it mean to say there is no last pattern present?
This part is taken from the previous implementation since this is handled in a different way in the new implementation, this code is deleted.
Minor change - shall we remove the spaces around | in unions?
